Alphah/Khonkolor::

Alphah said "Well sir, the best would be that you sit down this new 
might be shocking..."

Alpha stopped in order to find the way to tell, this new to Epyon, 
while that happen Konkholor say to Epyon "what's she saying, what is 
she saying???" after that the Young maximal put close his ears near 
Epyon's wrist com unit and when he noticed that he couldn't ear 
anithing he impatiently wait so see any Epyon reaction; Nightstrike 
moved away, he was bored and he didn pay attention to the maximals.

"Well"said at least Alpha while she tried to hold her sobbs"I hate 
break the news, boss-bot... I really sorry to say this... I have news 
about Condor... Megatron and their decepticons... He... they 
rerpogramed Condor... I guess that he doesn't remember us... now he 
belive that his name is Nightstrike... I don't know where is he or 
how he's like..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He tapped a few buttons on his wrist comm unit. The message now went
> directly to his sound recievers(ears), and no one could here it.
> "It's ok now, Alpha. You are no longer broadcasting out loud."
